column17:
Give your little girl a feel of fabulousness with these bellies from Kittens. The pink pair features a cute bow on the front. The velcro strap on the ankle makes sure that the bellies fit in her feet easily. The sole is slip-resistant and sturdy ensuring proper grip.
Features
  • Colour: Pink
  • Style: Round toe
  • Detailing: Bow detail
  • Lining: Comfortable lining

Style it up with a pair of denims or a frock for a cute look.
